original_text: Moreover, the bronze altar that Bezalel the son of Uri, son of Hur, had made, was there before the tabernacle of the Lord. And Solomon and the assembly sought it out.
korean_text: 옛적에 훌의 손자 우리의 아들 브살렐이 지은 놋제단은 여호와의 장막 앞에 있더라 솔로몬이 회중과 더불어 나아가서

sentences.original_text: that Bezalel the son of Uri, son of Hur, had made,
sentences.korean_translation: 브사렐 우리의 아들 훌의 손자가 만든 것은

sentences.original_text: was there before the tabernacle of the Lord.
